mintonetteCup.title: Montpellier hosts the Mintonette Cup, the world volleyball tournament bringing together the best players!

pageLog.texteRejoindre: Don’t have an account yet? Sign up and start your journey with us today.

burgerStand.title: Burger Stand
burgerStand.description:
Good news! The burger stand will indeed be present at the Mintonette Cup.
You’ll find a wide selection to satisfy every craving: tasty classic burgers,
more indulgent recipes, as well as vegetarian options so everyone can enjoy.

Whether you’re a meat lover or prefer lighter alternatives, everyone will be warmly welcomed. It’s the perfect opportunity to share a friendly moment over a good meal while enjoying the event!
